original_text:
Hopes placed in mortals die with them;
    all the promise of their power comes to nothing.
korean_text: 악인은 죽을 때에 그 소망이 끊어지나니 불의의 소망이 없어지느니라

sentences.original_text: Hopes placed in mortals die with them
sentences.korean_translation: 죽을 인간에게 둔 희망은 그들과 함께 죽는다

sentences.original_text: all the promise of their power comes to nothing
